name: Line 98 Premium - Color Lines 98
description:
Color Lines 98 - easy to play, hard to master, this game will challenge your logic skills to clear lines of colorful balls from a grid.

This fun and addictive logic puzzle game features a grid that is filled with colorful balls. Move one ball per turn to attempt to make a line of at least 5 same colored balls. If no such lines are created, three new balls will be spawned. If the board fills up, the game is over.

Fun logic gaming with challenging puzzle play is what you can expect. With Game Center integration, you can play against your friends and compete for top ranks on the Color Lines 98 Leaderboard!

Color Lines 98 Features:
• Free fun puzzle game
• Challenging logic puzzle
• Awesome graphics and effects
• Competitive scoring on our leaderboard
• Professionally designed and brilliantly created gaming
• Play against friends and family for high score and bragging rights
• In the PREMIUM VERSION you can undo up to 10 times and enjoy NO ADS!
• Expertly laid out playfield that will offer hours of puzzle fun for most gamers

See how many lines you can clear before the grid fills up!

Challenge your brain today with Color Lines 98!
